content.detailedDescription: Lake monticello, virgina...Me and my brother were cat fishing, i cant remember the exact year n date, but this will help... the only reason we were cat fishing that nite was there was suppose 2 be a comit shower, it was amazing but wat i saw wasn't that, my dad was navy, nukeular subs bla bla 2 nuke plants.  i saw nuke subs practicing torpedios in scotland, yuma az, saw amazing stuff, c130's with rockits under there wings 4 like emergency take offs with short run ways,literally 200 ft from harriers landing, it was just a chained linked fence @the time. the noise and airforce is amasing, but the best thing is rite b4 there bout 2ft mayby 1/12 ft they just drop....I know aircraft.....                                                                                                                                                                                                                       #2                                                                           like i said we were catfishing, its pretty freaking boring,  i just noticed this light shooting down, after several seconds i new it wasn't normall.                                                                                                                                               #3                                                                           i thought it was a police/search helicopter... @that time there was none of that, just a helicopter @uva hospital for medical evap.                                                                                                                                                  #4                                                                          we were cat fishing, and all of a sudden there was a light in the middle of the lake, seconds later i new it wasn't a lite, it was a beam, about the width  of a basketball, yet it was solid like you could throw a rock at it and it bounce off it, it was solid...The laser thingy went off and @ the exact moment the 3 lights came on and i could see it now, and it id say cruised over 2wards virginia beach, it was really slow, just cruising . huge black triangle, i saw it....It was real, my unckle saw 1 to, he was an artist i worked for him. he drew it as soon as he got home, he said it was a flying black remote controller being chased or followed by a  huey, he passed away but his wife is still alive, my grand dad saw a landing......I have a pictrure. i need 2 talk with sum, yes missing time, yes ive seen or saw sumthing, yes ive seen them.....I need 2 talk 2 sum one please
content.summary: Cat fishing lazer shot down in the lake

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photo of some very high cloud cover for my wife while we were standing on a driveway facing northwest over an empty field. photo shows bright oval object glowing brightly with yellow-white blending to blue and a faint bluish trail following it. my wife was looking in the same direction but didn't see it. took another shot in opposite direction to see if it was a speck of dust on the lense and it did not show anything.
content.summary: Appeared on photo with trail running contrary to cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the way to work in manchester england on my mountain bike in the area of gorton/reddish at approximately 7.55am on a cloudless morning in about april/may 1997 and was a few hundred yards away from my factory when i looked up and saw a metallic silver disc that was almost directly overhead and it was stationary.
it was about the size of a golf ball from my visionary prospective and i have 20 20 vision still to this day and was able to see without a doubt it was a classic flying saucer.

i got the feeling although very subtle that it knew i could see it as this was happening i rode under a trees foliage which also gave me the feeling if i lost sight of it it would disappear to which it absolutely did and i only lost sight of it for a second.
the sky was unhindered in the way of clouds blocking my observation so it totally vanished when in the space of as far as the eye can see in about a second.
i started laughing because i felt it had purposely shown itself to me to prove a point and the reason i say that is i was watching a lot of ufo documentaries about 3 months before and had stated in my house that i would love to see a ufo in broad daylight so i could be certain the objects were real.
the whole sighting lasted no more than 3 seconds.
content.summary: Silver metallic stationary disc hovering above industrial complex then instantly vanishes

content.detailedDescription:
A couple of us were out side at 10am to about 11am we observed several airplanes flying in the air over head. we took a few photos of them while talking about chem trails and the truth to it. as we live in canada we often see vapour trails but rarely do we see the chem trails(they seem to stay and spread out. soon after cloud cover) any ways while walking around our building we saw another vapour trail without anything in front of it so i took a shot of it twice cause i was so amazed! this seems to be a serious siting as i have had some crazy things happen to me over the last year i take it quite serious when i see something i know should be present and its not. im a son of a navy diver from the antlantic and pacific fleet diving unit so im very familier with airplanes and most of the tech associated with them. 



ps cant figure out how to get photo from phone to my computer i hope i can submit later.
content.summary: i took a picture of an airplane that we could hear then saw the vapour trail with no sound and no plane so i snapped a shot and magnified and sure enough nothings there!

content.detailedDescription: I had dropped my girlfriend (my now wife of 25 yrs) at her mom and dad's house (witch is in the woods)after one of our first dates,we were standing on the for the porch just talking and getting to know each other better we then noticed so star like lights moving around in the sky,they were all at the same time but in different directions moving up,down,left,right but we're in a cluster in the same direction but moving in different directions. when we first saw the objects we knew that they could be nothing else but ful's we looked at them and looked each other and immediately knew nothing like this was from this planet(they were to far away and moving like nothing in this world). after watching them for at least fifteen minutes or so we said to each other that this was so weird and that nobody would ever believe us, so at that time we made a packed never to tell anyone or discuss it again. so we watched them doing the same thing for another fifteen twenty minutes when we decided it was getting late and we left each other, they were still there when we left. we never really discussed it again but this secret i believe helped the trust in our relationship. now this is the weird part years later after we had our first child(about 10 12 yrs)in a different location we were walking into an applebee's restaurant, while walking through the parking lot we saw the same exact thing this time there were a few more witnesses. this time i knew more about ufo's and abductions so as fast as they were moving and the distance they were covering i was scared, it just felt like they could be in front of us so fast i had a weird feeling like we could be abducted. i don't know what that felling was so we stopped watching and went in to the restaurant. we never so this again, i could show the exact places and directions they still are there. i have never seen this on any tv shows,magazines or books.I would love to know what they were or any thing about them.
content.summary: These were 6 to 10 star like lights miles in the sky that were shooting back,forth,up,down and dancing around each other

content.detailedDescription:
Just after 7:30pm on monday evening i was sitting outside and noticed a clear "tube" of air extending upwards from the light wispy clouds to the south-west.  it resembled a tornado funnel except it was completely clear/see- through.  it extended out from the lowest clouds and then exponentially upwards.  it did not move and there was no wind present at all.  after about 5 minutes i decided to get my cell phone and snap a picture of it. i pointed it out to my wife.   the formation remained and did not move.  after a further 5 minutes i went back inside and lost track.  

i came back to the photo today and having never seen such a thing and after having not found any explanations online i thought i should post it here. not sure if its weather phenomenon or something else.
content.summary: Clear "tube" of air in light clouds extending upwards

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house watching tv..And felt like going outside to stargaze. i went out side and looked up right at a golden white light it was right on top of the house descending about 5 to 10feet above the roof,i smiled at it and it slowly ascended back up into the sky very slow,it seemed small like a balloon or soccer ball and moved very slow.I feel like it was talking to me in my head but without words.It came back a few more times.I finally got my mother to see it one night..Worried her a little..She was unsettled about it.This next thing is why i'm telling you this cause i need answers so...I was laying on the couch watching tv..And i felt like someone was watching me in from the hallway i felt something different bout the feelings i was having.I looked back again towards the hallway and that's when i noticed a light coming out of the ceiling in the living room. i watched it ,it was so cool looking golden white light and then it started producing a bit of red light in the beam the red lights started to form like a diamond shape inside the beam..And that's when i thought "oh damn" so i called out for someone to wake up so they could see it too..(i called for my mom)but i was unable to speak ..I felt like something wouldn't let me talk...So i tried harder cause now im freaking out cause they wont let me speak so i had to try really hard to scream...As soon as i got out a loud "mom" it was as if i just woke up from a nightmare\dream but it was not!I was in the same position on the couch and the show i was watching wasn't on anymore..I lost time but do not know how long. ..After this happened i have seen triangle crafts. orbs,two crafts that remind me of "jacks" the little silver jacks you play with with that little rubber ball,but they were not small,and they made the power lines hum ...I have seen entities, matter in fact bigfoot showed up in my back yard during this time..I am going through changes..An awakening if you will.This is hard to talk about.It wouldn't bother me if they just asked but i feel manipulated and violated...I just need to talk to someone that knows im not crazy.  there are a couple more events but this is the one that bothers me.Thank you for you time and efforts to understand these beings.My mom and sister saw the orb.But did not see the beam inside the house.
content.summary: I have had more than one event in a span of a few months. they followed me to nc

content.detailedDescription:
i was just finishing talking, on the phone, with my sister and as i stood up to hang up the phone i saw what i thought was a new moon and a planet directly above the tip. i said, wow! i've got yo get a picture of this.
  my camera was about 100 feet away and by the time i got the camera and went outside ( only a couple minutes ) a cloud was moving to partially block my view.  i walked to another location due to trees in the yard and by this time the moon and ( ? ) were at a slightly different position.  i did take several pictures from a couple of different places.  even steadied the camera by leaning against a column.  my son-in-law came home during this time and told me of a better sighting spot at that moment. then: it started to rain and i came into the house feeling that i might have gotten a good picture of the moon and a planet... put my camera away and didn't even look at the pictures until a night or so later.
  when i downloaded the pictures to my computer and saw them on a large monitor i could not believe my eyes.  first the one that looks like a classic ufo and then a couple pictures later that were very different looking. one the object above the moon looked like a yellow/orange burning ball and the other picture it appeared asteroid shaped and without color.
content.summary: My photo of what i thought was a crescent moon and planet turned out to be a crescent moon and something else.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone at mufon hq, by field investigator l. flechtner.
____________________________________________________________________


in the evening may of 2014,i saw a light in the sky going over my house and i knew it wasn't an airplane.  it was round in shape,like a hole in the sky with a blueish white light in the center. i got a flashlight and flashed it at the craft. the  light seemed to be absorbed. 
three days later i heard/felt a noise in my right ear. i saw shadow forms walking around my yard. i feel like i'm being touched and can't see who is doing it. my jack russel dog sees them and goes crazy. they seem to be near a shed in my back yard. i have also seen a 2 foot by 10 feet tall blue light come from my shed to my coy pond. it is 3 or 4 feet off the ground.It lasts 30 sec and is gone.The light has many shades of blue in it and almost looks neon or psychedelic.
during the daylight i saw a static looking person peeking at me from around the tree. there are bunches of shadow people in my yard at night and they have done things to me. i have a dent in my head where they did something to me. i did go to the veterans hospital and talked to my doctor about that. there was also something put in my bellybutton that seemed to swim up to my lungs. a lot of other things have happened to me. i would like to make this known so no one else has to go through this, and try to find out what's happening.
content.summary: In may of 2014 i saw a light in the sky going over my house and i kmew it wasn't an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen unusual things throughout my life, what they were i do not know.  mainly i am contacting you to see where i can go to try and figure out what has been happening to me since i was a child and exactly what did happen.  i do not really feel like writing down everything that i remember over the years and would honestly rather do it over the phone or in person.  my number is listed above and can be reached after 315pm ohio time as i am off work then.
content.summary: In this one i was about 3 or 4 yrs old, awoke in bed to see a being standing at the foot of the bed.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report for witness at mufon hq by field investigator l. flechtner. report for historical reference, witness can be contacted.
_________________________________________________________________________
on a november night at 9:30 pm, i was going to the store for my wife and my dog started barking and i looked up and saw a hugh triangle craft. it was very dark with 10 pods on the bottom arranged like bowling pins. while it was hovering the lights dimmed and when it moved the lights got brighter. it slowly moved away over the city of great falls.
the next day the paper said 10 thousand people saw it.


i also had an experience in june of 1966 while i was stationed at malmstrom air force base. i was 20 years old and home at 2:30 in the afternoon, when i heard a large crowd of people making a commotion outside. when i went out and looked up a saucer shaped craft with a dome on top and on the bottom was flying over the power plant near the base. it seemed to be hovering over the plant. it was whitish grey metallic in color. i called norad/sac to report the sighting, the commander said it was the third call he got and to come to the base immediately. as i was rushing to work i saw 5 f105 jet aircraft scrambled toward the ufo. the ufo immediately sped off and disappeared. when i got to my office i was told to not mention anything about the sighting. i was tasked with sending a message describing the approximate height of the craft and other descriptions, the message said the ufo traveled at mach 25 when it flew away.
the next day the paper said people saw venus, at 2:30 in the afternoon, in the sky.
content.summary: Saw saw a giant triangle craft over the house and then fly over the city

content.detailedDescription: First yellow and orange caught are attention and came closer and closer .,.Orange yellow red but there was blue kinda circle the two objects.... the pic shows more blue then we saw?!   we honestly didn't know what the two objects where i've seen tons of planes at night etc this was not that idk atmospheric phenomena or something no idea,!   it was creepy because we had no idea what we were looking at... then darkness nothing we say there never reapeared...
content.summary: First yellow and orange caught are attention and came closer and closer .,.Orange yellow red but there was blue kinda circle surrounding the two objects.... the pic shows more blue then we saw?!

content.detailedDescription: I was out on a balcony overlooking the gulf of mexico with my wife and two other family friends.  one of my friends shouted "is that a ufo?"  where pointed towards the sw.  we all looked up and saw this ufo seemingly glide to the sw/w with no sound.  there was a red dot in the middle of the ufo that did not blink.  the outer edges of the ufo seemed to be wobbly and there seemed to be no solid state, it was always changing its shape.  imagine a amoeba flying, that's what i could describe the shape as.  around the solid red light, the color was white, but it was very translucent.  i could see through it and it was going in a straight direction and was following the beach line until it disappeared behind a condo complex.
content.summary: Ufo moved silently.  red stationary light with translucent body that changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture of the landscape where i was staying in odessa on a business trip. later, when reviewing the picture, i spotted a dual orb type object i can only define as unidentified. i thought it odd because the sky was perfectly blue and there no planes or birds in the vicinity at the time. it has been suggested that it could be a cloud but i am sure the sky was clear. picture was taken from the courtyard marriott hotel. i have included the first photo then a expanded view photo...Taken on an i phone 4s.
content.summary: Item was captured in photgraph

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness this event as i am about to relay here. but i feel that what i captured on my 35mm camera that day may have been.

my husband and i were visiting family members in western kansas sometime ago in the fall of 2004. we had gone to an area called castle rock approx south southeast of quinter kansas. this area is open range with pasture, chalk rock formations.

as we were leaving the area i noticed some cottonwood trees and horses that i wanted to take some pictures of. i pulled over and getting out i took my 35 mm camera and color film over to the fence where the horses were. i recall taking a few photos of the turning colors of the cottonwood trees and of the horses. i noted that i still had a few blank shots left and decided to just take some random pot shots not really aiming at anything so i could "finish" the roll and put in a fresh roll.

i started to walk in front of our vehicle clicking away with the camera. i don't remember getting into the vehicle itself. i remember that i was sitting in the drivers seat next,changing out the roll and talking to my husband. i started the car and left. several days later we were back home in new hampshire.

i took my film to our local camera store( which has since gone out of business and the owner has died) and picked it up several days later. the owner wanted me to open the envelope and take a look at my shots. near the end of the roll was a "black and white" shot with a "squashed purple" object suspended in air in the middle of the shot. the owner had no clue nor did the other employees there as to what this was.

we made some wild guesses. but the owner stated that it was showing up on the negative and they could not detect any manipulation of the film. my husband and i were and still are friends with a former mufon investigator. we sent a copy of the photo to him. he was unable to detect anything that would indicate manipulation or damage to the photo. 

i had carefully stored the negative in a safe place, our home. but over the years i have tried to locate that negative and have not been able to find it. we have shown this photo to several experienced people and they do not have a clue. it concerns me that maybe my husband and i had an event that we have suppressed so deeply we can't recall. all we have is this photo. please keep in mind that i nor my spouse saw anything during that event, as far as we know.  

i submitted this story to the mufon editor and he asked me to download it to this website. i give permission to any staffer(s) that would like to look into this and maybe finally give us an answer.
content.summary: I was not aware of any events until my film was developed and it was pointed out to me and my spouse that there was something unusual captured on the negative/film

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't see a ufo, but perhaps evidence of one that was there

humid day- rain showers to the east. there were other dark thin clouds in the sky, but nothing with almost perfect edges like this. i was driving a bus going 55mph eastbound on i-94 just west of madison, wi.

it looks odd to me as it looks like someone just took a knife and cut the cloud, and it's too high to be a shadow. looks like it cut straight through on a latitudinal path.

pictures are from my samsung galaxy s6 on various zooms. it disappeared within 3 minutes. the 6 i shots were on a span of 1 minute 30 seconds.
content.summary: Cut cloud at least a mile wide

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were outside stargazing and at about 10:45pm we saw bright orange fireball light appear in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane crash it was like a fire in the sky but it stayed still for a few minutes before shrinking up and moving right (east). 2 blinking lights followed it and then it all disapeared. we thought it was strange but couldnt record it since my phone was dead and it only lasted about 3 minutes. we went inside and googled it and got a little freaked out. there had been planes flying around beforehand and after so we thought maybe a military drill? we found videos and pictures that matched what we saw around the same time of day dated a few years back. the one on the washinton mufon network page of the orange light is very similiar but the one we saw was distinctly orange and fireball looking before shrinking up and moving east.
content.summary: Bright orange light in sky (fire in sky) thought it was a plane crash but it didnt move, shrank up and moved eas, blinking lights followed then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a meeting heading due east when i noticed a very bright white light outside of the driver side window. it was approximately 80 degrees above the horizon moving rapidly and making no sound. at first i though it was the iss, but having seen the iss many times this did not look like what i had seen in the past. then i thought of an aircraft, i live near newark liberty int'l airport but there were no navigational lights and again no sounds of jet engines or turbo props. this also was no helicopter.

after passing overhead, a short time later i noticed a pulsating white light. i then lost sight of it as it passed behind some tall trees. i am  an amateur astronomer and have spent hundreds of hours looking at the sky through a telescope or binoculars and have never witnessed anything like this before. it was not a comet, meteor or satellite. i checked the nasa iss website and the station was not due to pass over my area until over 1 hour later. as a matter of fact i observed the station later that evening. i also went on a satellite  tracker web site and there were none visible from my location that evening during that time period.
content.summary: Star like object bright white light moving rapidly, silent moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
In the early morning hours, i was awakened by noises on my roof or the
deck. i heard 2 loud claps and was instantly aware of a mechanical presence
standing in the doorway of my bedroom. i saw a beam of light scan my body.
the impression i received was "i'm just here to do a job." since the light was still on in my bedroom i tried to move from my sleeping position to 
see what was going on. i realized i was paralyzed and couldn't call
for my dog. i think i feel asleep, because i remember awakening again
and i was lying on my stomach with a beam of light moving back and forth
over the area of my chest to my hips. the next beam of light caused extreme pressure in the same area. the pressure beam continued many times
until i started to fear for my life. later on, i awoke as normal in the
morning. i instantly recalled the prior events, knowing that it wasn't a
dream. within 30 hours since the event, my doctor performed an upper gi
procedure and found that my ulcers had been cured. prior to my visitation,
i had been in agony with pain coming from ulcer area. i had planned to go to the er that morning. also unusual was that i heard the sound of a distant cell phone ringing constantly until after midnight of the same
night as the visit. there were no other cell phones in my home that could
make that noise. i thought it was important to report this event because
it shows that et can do miracles.
content.summary: Et healed me!

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my apartment, smoking a cigarette and drinking a cup of coffee.  i was watching a couple of doves in a pecan tree.  then a squirrel jumped out of the tree onto the roof of the apartments across the street.  the squirrel was running across the peak of the roof about midways of the building.  i was facing almost directly south when i noticed a triangular shaped object just above and to the left of the squirrel, coming at me at a high rate of speed.  it was like a blurry triangular shape with a fuzzy, medium brown outline. it appeared to be a perfect triangular shape with one point up. the color of the body of the object appeared transparent, as it seemed to change color to match the sky and the clouds as it went past.  i would guess the cloud cover to be at an altitude of about 1200 to 1300 feet.  the object was flying under the clouds.  the total time elapsed from the time it caught my eye to when it was out of sight was 3 seconds.  there was no sound, no emissions, nothing but the sight of the object flying by.  the speed of the object startled me and caused me to catch and hold my breath.  i have never seen anything like it before.  i know it wasn't just a formation of birds or anything like that because it was a perfect geometric shape.  it appeared to be flying faster than the jets that fly over at the university of texas graduation ceremonies and the f4 jets i have seen at airshows.  it was flying so fast that my eyes were only able to focus on it momentarily and that's when i noticed 3 lighter brownish fuzzy lines equidistantly spaced in the body of the object.  i also noticed at that time when it was almost directly above me that it appeared to be an elongated triangular shape.  the two sides of the triangle were approximately 3 times the length of the back.  the only way i could try to estimate the size of the object was to raise my arm and hold my thumb and forefinger apart at about the size of the length of it in the sky.  that was about 2 inches total length.  considering the height of the clouds and the length the object appeared to be as it flew under the clouds it might be possible to estimate its length.  to me it seemed to be about 1/2 to 2/3 the length of an f4 fighter jet.  it flew in a perfectly straight line with no weave or bobble.  i mentioned this incident to a neighbor lady who said i ought to report it.
content.summary: Watching squirrel on roof across street. saw object fly towards me at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my parents vacation house on deep creek lake. we were having a nice evening out by the camp fire. it was about time to call it a night, as everyone else had gone into bed. i was the only one left out by the fire, sitting back in my chair looking at the beautiful night sky. this part of maryland you can see the stars without any obstructions from city lights and on this night there were no clouds. i saw 5 white lights in a triangle shape move across the sky at such a high speed. they were there and within a couple seconds they were gone. the lights looked like regular stars and what i mean by that is they were so far away/high up in the sky. they moved so fast across the sky that i would compare it to the pace and speed of a shooting star, maybe slightly slower. i have no idea what it was but it gave me goosebumps because i was so taken back by it.
content.summary: 5 lights in a triangle shape huge and very fast!

content.detailedDescription: This spring i went out at 11 pm to let my dog out before i headed to bed. the leaves were off the trees and you could see a good amount of stars out even with my outdoor flood light on. i was looking at the stars when i noticed one of the stars changing colors from red to green to blue. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, so i went in and turned my flood lights out and returned to my deck. i continued to see the objected that was a little bigger then the north star in size. i went inside and grab my binoculars. when i looked at the object i immediately got goosebumps because i couldn't explain what i was seeing. it changed color just like a deep sea jellyfish. it was some of the most beautiful colors i have ever seen and i felt as if i could almost make out a shape behind the colors. i ran inside and woke my mother up because i had to get a second opinion on the object. i showed it to her and she said "omg that is really weird, what is it". we then noticed that the object was moving back and forth very slowly. we were both fixated on the object for the next 30 mins. until i decided to go in and research stars that might be in the area. i found some articles about twinkling stars low near to the horizon that look as if they change colors because of their light being bent by earths atmosphere. but this object was not near the horizon at all and in my opinion was not a star by any means. the object returned for the next 2 weeks at the same time. my father came back into town a week later and i woke him up the first night he was home to show him. he also agreed that it is not a star and that it was really something after all. he went on to speculate that it could be a secret government craft, maybe a anti-satellite project. then the leaves starred to fill in and my view was blocked. we all three walked away from this experience scratching our heads. to this day i have no idea what i saw and i would love to know what the hell is going on.
content.summary: Changing lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was well, the school was done and well i saw a white/gray thing in the sky i said it 2 my friend and he saw it asssswell i tryed 2 take picture but it was 2 small 2 see something i asked so girls nearbyyuo and they saw it 2 so i asked them if they could take a picture but they well 2 small😕 again . then the girls screamed, smaller then scream but loud so she gave me attension i looked up in the sky and saw the thing was zigsagging north from the school 

is well did't now ifos were real😕
content.summary: Well i was at school then i saw a white round thing in the sky, i said it 2 my friend and he saw it i said 2 some girls and they saw it 2 so i asked if they coudyhy take a picture but it was 2 small 4 our phones😞

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were looking at the moon through our telescope and my husband told me to take my turn and asked me if i saw anything. i said  yes i saw a  white round blotchy  object traveling at a high rate of speed it had a dust trail. we watched it for ten to fifteen minutes.
content.summary: Observed this object through telelscope traveling on  the moons surface at a high reat of speed. and it had a  dust trail

content.detailedDescription: When i am falling asleep the paralysis start. i hear the hum or buzzing and i become  paralyzed. the torture starts, the pain is  unbearable and my fear is beyond description. i fight to pull myself out  and often times i can glimpse  them around me. i have seen orbs above me and the humming  or vibrational sound  is all i can hear. i feel my body floating and i have no control. it's night after night and i try not to fall asleep but i eventually  doze off and before i am even asleep the humming starts and i know it's starting.  one year ago i started getting really sick, i was sick for 3 months straight then it faded a little. i am getting sick again and the nightly visitations have intensified. i have a strange rash on my neck and have found unexplained marks on my body at different times .  i stay exhausted from lack of sleep.  i went to the doctor but all testing came  back normal.   years back in a vivid dream state i was on a ship and saw the earth in the far distance.  i was shown amazing things as well as future events all playing out on a big screen that was really amazing  but it soon went from amazing to terrifying because it wasn't to long after that the paralysis started along with the pain and torture.    i was 16 when that event happened and i am now 31.  i need help, it used to come and go, leaving me alone for months at a time but there has been little let up for the past year. i have kept this to myself for so long but it is becoming more than i can handle.  i need to see a field representative, i fear for my life.
content.summary: Oval..

content.detailedDescription: In 1960 i was three and a half years was.Living at home in port dover ontario canada.The electronic message received was to indicate the current year.I tried to find out the year however i was too young and it was not possible to get an adult to say nineteen sixty.This was and is a part of the us governments time expariments.The experiment was successful.Electronic information was directed to the wrong time and place.Interuptions in time have in the past and now are cueerntly disjointed.I did not know who to contact with this information please forgive me for contacting you as i did not know who to turn to.I made contact with americans to report this and overheard them on the phone they did not take me seriously.My calls to try and contact the fbi resulted in being put in contact with a private security guard agency.There was no contacting the us authorities.There have been several time and place diruptions.There were no landmark indicators date time location groupings to set as a baseline for these expariments.Several ufo researchers when trying to understand the alien technowedgies are having difficulties due to time displacements.This is the key the scientists are looking for.Time and distance have been affected.There is only a small amount of time left to put some things the way they were supposed to be.Places are missing the experiments as i said before are causing alternatative outcomes.These outcomes have resulted in outcomes which result in kaos.What needs to be done is to place markers in the desert one hundred meters apart in a square and indicate the date and tme including the year this is done so it is visible to the sky.This is much later than the us government needs it to be also other events must occur to stabilise the situation.This is not a ufo siting.It is the result of an experiment which was successful by the us government.Why did they contact me i do not know.Are there any others out there which have had the same experiences as me that is the question.If you choose not to contact me i will not pass anymore information foreward.Thank you.
content.summary: Time event successful misplaced timing. timing out of place.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Camping on south fork of payette river near alder creek road and south fork roud outside of garden valley, 930pm until 1230 am between 1 and 3 objects mostly one a night, 3 seperate have flown ovee head and disapeared, have photos and video of light, different nights on samsung galexy s5,
content.summary: Same bright light eastward direction atleast once a night between 930pm and 1230 ambright from begining to end, glowed in cloud

content.detailedDescription: While working as a cook at local restaurant, my head chef and i took out the trash at the close of our shift. the back deck area of this restaurant gives a great view of the northern section of tarrytown. specifically the hudson river. while working outside my chef suddenly exclaimed"*my name* look at that!" as i turned my head left i then noticed a green fireball shooting across the sky illuminating a small area of the dark part of the city. it emmited a redish/orange trail, but dit not show any debris, breaking off of it. i have seen meteors in the past but this seemed much larger, about a half, to a third of the size of a compact car; moved slower, glowed brighter and actually seemed to have landed in / around the hudson river. possibly where gory brook meets the hudson. i couldnt tell if it just stopped glowing (burned out if a meteor) and went into darkness, or if it collided with the water. it also seemed to move in kind of an arc rather than a strait line, but this may have just been my viewing angle.  my observation of the object lasted about 7 seconds, not counting the few my chef saw it and told me to look. it seemed to have traveled from north east to south west at something like  a 20 degree angle. my best guess was that it was traveling at over 100 mph but i cant be sure. i'm certainly not an expert my first thoughts were a mix of ufo, or just a meteor. but as i said ive seen shooting stars/ meteors before, always at high altitudes and yellowish in color. also commercial airliners were visible after witnessing the object at much higher altitudes. thought id report it somewhere, just in case. my chef jokingly said must be a ufo, i didnt really know what to think
content.summary: Observed green fireball descending at a wide angle toward a river apparently landing in the water

content.detailedDescription: I was 8 years old and laying in bed, in an instant a basketball sized orb appeared directly above my head. it was red and orange in color swirling together inside but had a dim glow around the outside edges. i was stunned at first but became extremely curious having never seen anything like this before. i felt completely at peace and felt a welcoming since of love, as if it knew me and it was welcoming me to embrace it. i can remember i had a big smile on my face and i reached up and with a hand on each side of it i pushed in to see what it felt like. i'm a child mind you but my explanation of how it felt was like a marsh mellow, when i pushed in it pushed back. my experience lasted maybe one minute and then i blacked out walking up the next morning in aww. the very next night it reappeared exactly as it had the night before. again it allowed me to hold it and i squeezed it as i did before. this experience happened exactly as it had the night before with the same result waking up in the morning totally blown away. for the next week i tried over and over to do exactly what i had done those two night before, wishing it would come back but it didn't. this changed my life forever but that isn't it. i've had two separate experiences from the orb visitations several years later. into one case, contact was made with one tall, and one short grey where i entered a small circular craft. i was at a secluded area where i kept my horses and as i walked to the corral i was stopped by a 7 to 8 foot tall grey, but the face of the grey had the imagage of my sisters face and she told me it was alright and to go ahead where a small grey walked me to the craft. when i entered i saw another tall grey standing across from me inside the craft and as i walked to the center of the craft i could see what appeared to a radial shaped control panel to my left with a window above it. the small grey told me we would be going straight up and coming straight down and that was the last thing i remember until i was back in the corral. the other event happened at the same location in the back hills where the nearest neighbor was a quarter mile away. i don't know why i decided to walk up a remote path but towards the end of it was a similar sized craft where i saw only one tall grey but this time it didn't have my sisters face. i remember walking towards the being and the next thing i remember was walking back down the path towards the corral wondering what i was doing. since then i have done nothing but research the ufo phenomenon. i cant quench this thirst for knowledge and have finally decided to reach out for answers and help. i've had regressive hypnosis done but i was unable to be hypnotised. i have the evidence to prove i'm not a fraud, i have one triangular scoop mark that has faded pretty badly, but i have a recent one from 10 years ago that you can still stick the tip of your pinky finger in and clearly see its triangular shape. my wife can testify as to the two brown crusty scabs on the same calf as the scoop mark that i received in the same event and didn't go away for two years although they did leave a scar. my case is real, alien life forms have found an interest in me since i was a little boy and i dont know what it is. my life was changed forever by these events and i just want to talk to someone who knows more about this mysterious thing we call our universe than myself. i am educated holding a ba in sociology from sdsu and three aas from sdcc. its time for me to share my experience with specialist like mufon, so please, please respond to me if only to have someone who understands this better than me give me a path to support groups, sincerely, stevenmunz
content.summary: Appeared directly above my head, allowed me to hold it with both hands, appeared two nights in a row, similar each time. two other events involving crafts

content.detailedDescription:
1-i was at my best friend's home, because i would sleep in her house. we were looking at the stars, because we love to do that. we were smoking a cigarette, talking about the stars, pollution and various subjects.
2- when we look at the sky, in front, on the hospital, we saw something appear from nothing then disappeared after a few meters that the object have moved.
3- it wasn't the first time that i saw a strange phenomenon, but i was drawn to the unidentified object.
4-6- looking in front, where the general hospital of our city was, we saw that something came out of nowhere. it was like an oval face of a very, very bright white. at high speed, it moved eastward, and after a few meters moved, disappeared. as if it had never been there.
5- my friend was very surprised, like me, when we saw that happened. we also scared at first, we did not know what was happening, because that night we saw some very strange things. but then i felt terribly attracted to that object. an object that had appeared out of nowhere, because there were no clouds around, and disappeared as if something cover it. as if it were not there.
content.summary: It appeared out of nowhere in the middle of the night, and went up.
